channel.title: Need help adding multi worlds
channel.description: Hi im using insidiax v2 client/source i have one world up already up and trying to get another world working i have the second world running on port 5555 and the first world running on 43594, i need to make a button on the client somewhere that when clicked switches port so when it says world 1 = port 43594 then when you click it, it says world 2 = port 5555 can anyone help with this?

item.title: Need help adding multi worlds

item.description:
@kieran1994 wrote:

Thanks For the help

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding multi worlds
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

if you don’t want to hack around in the client i suggest wrapping the client in a jframe if you haven’t already and use a http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/uiswing/components/dialog.html#input to allow the user to select the world. change the ip and port dependent upon the selected option.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding multi worlds
item.dc:creator: @kieran1994 kieran1994
item.description:
@kieran1994 wrote:

I must of said something wrong… i have 2 servers world 1/ world 2, world 1 runs on port 43594, world 2 runs on port 5555 one server will be spawn server = world 2 doesnt matter if it uses different char files what i need is a button on one client so i can switch world on the client any ideas how to sort this

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding multi worlds
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[code]Make a folder in you’re C:/ (C drive) Called “characters”
Go into client.java and search
“./characters/”
Type CTRL + H
In the top box put
Code:

“./characters/”

In the bottom put

“C:/characters/”
[/code]
That’ll save your character files and open your character files from your c: drive where your cache is saved if you have a webclient. For your second world change the port it runs on, portforward and it should be online. They will both run from the same character files however this leaves you prone to dupes.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding multi worlds
item.dc:creator: @kieran1994 kieran1994
item.description:
@kieran1994 wrote:

im using different accounts for different worlds is it possible for you to link me to a guide or something or post a short one here i could use i wanna learn how 2 do it not be given it thanks for posting

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding multi worlds
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

More complicated than you think. Not the switching part, this can make possible dupes. I got it operating but not sure how to stop the 1 of the dupes created multiple worlds create. Unless you use different accounts for the worlds or only allow 1 person per world just leave it.

Read full topic
